channel.title: Some Sever Coding Questions
channel.description:
ok i have a question on adding shops. i use the shopmaker program right? well i fill everything out generate it and place it in my server--and i compile and i get the "100 errors" error. and then my server wont even load. (and im using an npc that has already been put in the server--i just change things around for it to work for me) oh and a link to a tutorial on how to add areas--noob freindly--would be nice.
(if anyone asks i can code somewhat--i can change the name of the server the starting location starting outfit, i can make it so you start out as a mod or admin for gods sake.)
my server base is runejava base source v3.0a, if you need to know.
please don't spam on this topic saying something like, "HAHA you noob! you can't code a simpile shop!" or anything like that please. if you do i won't hesitate to report you.

item.title: Some Sever Coding Questions
item.dc:creator: @Vesnal1 Vesnal1
item.description:
@Vesnal1 wrote:

On another topic

He’s saying it doesn’t work for him! Man this community is too lazy to get off its ass to help someone.

I agree, and if you just want to move shops around just go to autospawn.cfg search for the npc id and then change the x and y (x first y second) to the new ones. For example…

spawn = 944	3086	3516	0	0	0	0	0	1	Pking Gear

This npc is located at edge, but say I wanted him to be at castlewars instead. I would change the 2nd and third numbers to my new cords. (these are just made up, don’t use)

spawn = 944	6484	8489	0	0	0	0	0	1	Pking Gear

Read full topic
